msg: My name is Henrik Gerdes. I'm a computer scientist student at the university of Osnabrück (Germany). I have a passion for solving general, specific or hard problems in computer since. I love to find elegant and efficient ways to automate recurring tasks. In the last year I did some projects with computer/game graphics, low level socket programming and worked with routing in graphs.

Recently I did an internship at a security company and finished my bachlor thesis while working for an local software company. I love experimenting with different technologies and aumulated a knowlage in a varity of different fields. Examples are in the software area.

fav_projects.title: Galaxy Fight
msg: A round based 2D strategy game with 3D PvP fights.
Its basically a collection of my C++ skills. Including Templates,Boost, QT, OpenGL and SDL.

fav_projects.title: Pacmap
msg: Want to play Pacman in your home town streets? Want to compete with your friends?
Than play Pacmap. Its an multiplayer Pacman on street maps.

fav_projects.title: Beeblebrox CTF
msg: A VM for IT-Sec starters to learn Unix and find common IT Security flaws.
It includes Bash-Scripting, Web-Scraping and manipulation of Web-Authentication.

language.title: PYTHON
language.msg: 2 years data mining and manipulation. Also use of AI algorithms, PyGame and general scripting with Python 3.

language.title: WEB
language.msg: Fluid with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript. NodeJS backend and frontend projects using express, OAS and VUE.JS. I can to create REST APIs and responsive website with bootstrab.

language.title: C/C++
language.msg: 1 1/2 years developing algorithms, OpenGL vertices and GUI elements using QT

language.title: JAVA
language.msg: 3 years of object oriented programming, multimedia tools, datatypes and software-engineering concepts.
